items.title: Customer Experience Excellence
items.summary: Customer satisfaction score for Loan via MMS improved by 12%. Key driver: Payment enhancement.

items.title: Channel Performance Insight
items.summary: MMS showing 20% increase in Britama adoption. Monthly Fee is most used functionality.
